profiles.description: Hi, my name is Yevgeny Oborin (English translation is Jack) and I am professional iOS Developer from Russia, who loves making beautiful, outstanding apps. I have over 4 years of experience in software development and developed a range of applications from image-editing apps to location and social-based apps with content feeds, real-time messaging and commenting features. My #1 goal will always be to meet your needs and deadline. And if you're looking for a person who not 'just writes code', you're in right place. I developed own applications and I know every part of mobile development cycle from idea to publishing, and I can help to develop your great idea. I have experience developing own backend using BaaS solutions like Parse, Firebase. Please contact me and we will discuss how to make your app

With 20 years of experience in web and graphic designs. I created many design solutions that have high visual impact. I develop creative ideas and concepts, choosing the appropriate media and style to meet the client's objectives. My Portfolio: jayjaro.com I have an up-to-date knowledge of industry software including Adobe and Corel brands and easily redefine a design brief within the constraints of cost and time.
